loans.title: Loans
loans.description: Know your options — not all loans are created equal.

categories.name: Personal Loan
categories.description: Quick personal loans without collateral requirements

loans.title: Advance Salary Loan
loans.description: A short-term unsecured loan offered against your upcoming monthly salary. Ideal for meeting emergency expenses like medical bills, travel, or sudden cash needs, with quick disbursal and minimal eligibility requirements.
features: Quick disbursal (24–72 hours depending on loan type)
Unsecured loan (except Top-Up, which may require existing loan)
Loan amount as per lender policy (small to high ticket)
Flexible tenure (short-term to long-term depending on loan type)

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Quick disbursal (24–72 hours depending on loan type)
Unsecured loan (except Top-Up, which may require existing loan)
Loan amount as per lender policy (small to high ticket)
Flexible tenure (short-term to long-term depending on loan type)

sections.title: Eligibility
points: Minimum net monthly income ₹15,000+ (varies by lender)
Active bank account with salary/business credit history

sections.title: Onboarding Requirement
points: Address Proof: Aadhaar, Passport, Utility Bill, Rent Agreement
Income Proof (Salaried): Last 3 months salary slips, 6–12 months bank statements
Income Proof (Self-Employed): Last 2 years ITR, Balance Sheet, P&L statement, 12 months bank statement

loans.title: Balance Transfer Loan
loans.description: A refinancing option that allows transfer of an existing high-interest personal loan to a lender with lower interest rates to reduce EMI burden, with possible tenure extension and top-up facility.
features: Quick loan transfer to lower interest rates
Reduce EMI burden
Flexible repayment tenure
Option for top-up loan in some cases

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Quick loan transfer to lower interest rates
Option for top-up loan in some cases

sections.title: Eligibility
points: Salaried or self-employed individuals aged 21–60 years
Must have an active personal loan with existing lender

sections.title: Onboarding Requirement
points: Address Proof: Aadhaar, Passport, Utility Bill, Rent Agreement
Income Proof (Salaried): Last 3 months salary slips, 6–12 months bank statements
Income Proof (Self-Employed): Last 2 years ITR, Balance Sheet, P&L statement, 12 months bank statements

loans.title: Instant Personal Loan
loans.description: A fully digital small-ticket loan product designed for quick cash requirements, featuring 100% online application, instant approval, and rapid disbursal—ideal for emergencies and short-term financial gaps.
features: 100% digital approval
Small-ticket loans (₹10,000 – ₹5,00,000)
Disbursal in minutes

sections.title: Eligibility
points: Minimum income as per lender policy (₹15k–₹25k monthly)
Must have active bank account and KYC compliance

sections.title: Onboarding Requirement
points: Address Proof: Aadhaar, Passport, Utility Bill, Rent Agreement
Income Proof (Salaried): Last 3 months salary slips, 6–12 months bank statement
Income Proof (Self-Employed): Last 2 years ITR, Balance Sheet, P&L statement, 12 months bank statement

loans.title: Personal Loan
loans.description: A multi-purpose unsecured loan for personal needs like weddings, travel, education, or medical expenses, offering higher loan amounts and flexible repayment tenures without collateral.
features: 100% digital approval and instant disbursal
Small-ticket loans (₹10,000 – ₹5,00,000)
Flexible repayment tenure
Ideal for short-term financial needs and emergencies

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Ideal for short-term financial needs and emergencies

sections.title: Eligibility
points: Salaried or self-employed individuals aged 21–58 years
Minimum income as per lender policy (₹15k–₹25k monthly)
Must have active bank account and KYC compliance

sections.title: Onboarding Requirement
points: Address Proof: Aadhaar, Passport, Utility Bill, Rent Agreement
Income Proof (Salaried): Last 3 months salary slips, 6–12 months bank statements
Income Proof (Self-Employed): Last 2 years ITR, Balance Sheet, P&L statement, 12 months bank statements

loans.title: Personal Overdraft Facility
loans.description: A pre-approved revolving credit line linked to a salary or savings account, where interest is charged only on the utilized amount and funds can be withdrawn or repaid flexibly within the approved limit.
features: Pre-approved revolving credit
Interest only on usage
Flexible repayment

sections.title: Eligibility
points: Salaried individuals or professionals with stable income
Active salary or income credit in bank account

sections.title: Onboarding Requirement
points: Address Proof: Aadhaar, Passport, Utility Bill, Rent Agreement
Income Proof (Salaried): Last 3 months salary slips, 6–12 months bank statement
Income Proof (Self-Employed): Last 2 years ITR, Balance Sheet, P&L statement, 12 months bank statement

loans.title: Top-Up Loan
loans.description: An additional loan facility offered on top of an existing personal loan, providing extra funds without starting a new loan, with convenient processing and the same EMI cycle or tenure extension.
features: Convenient processing on existing personal loan
Same EMI cycle or tenure extension
Extra funds without a new loan

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Interest charged only on utilized amount
Ideal for short-term liquidity and emergency expenses

sections.title: Eligibility
points: Salaried individuals or professionals aged 21–58 years
Stable income with active salary or income credit in bank account

sections.title: Onboarding Requirement
points: Address Proof: Aadhaar, Passport, Utility Bill, Rent Agreement
Income Proof (Salaried): Last 3 months salary slips, 6–12 months bank statements
Income Proof (Self-Employed): Last 2 years ITR, Balance Sheet, P&L statement, 12 months bank statements

categories.name: Professional Loan
categories.description: Specialized loans for professionals

loans.title: Doctor Loan
loans.description: A specialized unsecured loan for medical professionals, including doctors and dentists, to fund clinic setup, practice expansion, medical equipment purchase, or professional development.
features: For clinic setup, practice expansion, or medical equipment purchase
Loan up to ₹50 Lakhs
Quick approval and flexible tenure

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: For clinic setup, practice expansion, or medical equipment purchase

sections.title: Onboarding Requirement
points: Identity Proof: Aadhaar, PAN, Passport or Voter ID
Address Proof: Aadhaar, Passport, Utility Bill
Professional Qualification: Degree Certificate, Registration with Professional Council (MCI, ICAI, etc.)
Income Proof (Salaried): Last 3 months salary slips, 6 months bank statements
Income Proof (Self-Employed): Last 2 years ITR, Balance Sheet and P&L, 12 months bank statements
Business Proof (if own practice or firm): Clinic or Practice Registration, GST Registration

loans.title: Chartered Accountant Loan
loans.description: Tailored for CAs and accounting professionals to meet business or personal financial requirements, such as office setup, software purchase, or career advancement, with flexible repayment options.
features: Office expansion, software purchase, and working capital support
Loan up to ₹50 Lakhs
Unsecured option available

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Office expansion, software purchase, and working capital support

sections.title: Onboarding Requirement
points: Identity Proof: Aadhaar, PAN, Passport or Voter ID
Address Proof: Aadhaar, Passport, Utility Bill
Professional Qualification: Degree Certificate, Registration with ICAI or COP
Income Proof (Salaried): Last 3 months salary slips, 6 months bank statements
Income Proof (Self-Employed): Last 2 years ITR, Balance Sheet and P&L, 12 months bank statements
Business Proof (if running own practice or firm): Registration Certificate, GST Registration

loans.title: Lawyer Loan
loans.description: A loan product for practicing lawyers to support office establishment, legal practice expansion, case-related expenses, or continuing education.
features: For office setup and litigation or case-related expenses
Flexible repayment options
Unsecured facility available

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: For office setup and litigation or case-related expenses

sections.title: Onboarding Requirement
points: Identity Proof: Aadhaar, PAN, Passport or Voter ID
Address Proof: Aadhaar, Passport, Utility Bill
Professional Qualification: Degree Certificate, Bar Council Registration
Income Proof (Salaried): Last 3 months salary slips, 6 months bank statements
Income Proof (Self-Employed): Last 2 years ITR, Balance Sheet and P&L, 12 months bank statements
Business Proof (if running own practice or firm): Registration Certificate, GST Registration

loans.title: Engineer / Architect Loan
loans.description: Aimed at engineers and architects to finance business expansion, purchase of professional tools and equipment, or project-related working capital needs.
features: Project financing and infrastructure support
Loan up to ₹50 Lakhs
Tailored for technical professionals

sections.title: Eligibility
points: Licensed engineers or architects aged 25–60 years

sections.title: Onboarding Requirement
points: Identity Proof: Aadhaar, PAN, Passport or Voter ID
Address Proof: Aadhaar, Passport, Utility Bill
Professional Qualification: Degree Certificate, Registration with Professional Council
Income Proof (Salaried): Last 3 months salary slips, 6 months bank statements
Income Proof (Self-Employed): Last 2 years ITR, Balance Sheet and P&L, 12 months bank statements
Business Proof (if running own practice or firm): Registration Certificate, GST Registration

loans.title: Consultant Loan
loans.description: A loan designed for independent consultants and advisory professionals to manage office infrastructure, business growth, and professional investments.
features: For office setup, business expansion, and professional investments
Loan up to ₹50 Lakhs
Flexible repayment options
Unsecured or secured options available

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: For office setup, business expansion, and professional investments

sections.title: Eligibility
points: Independent consultants or advisory professionals aged 21–60 years
Minimum 2 years of professional experience preferred

sections.title: Onboarding Requirement
points: Identity Proof: Aadhaar, PAN, Passport or Voter ID
Address Proof: Aadhaar, Passport, Utility Bill
Professional Qualification: Degree Certificate, Registration with Professional Council (if applicable)
Income Proof (Salaried): Last 3 months salary slips, 6 months bank statements
Income Proof (Self-Employed): Last 2 years ITR, Balance Sheet and P&L, 12 months bank statements
Business Proof (if running own practice or firm): Registration Certificate, GST Registration

loans.title: Company Secretary Loan
loans.description: A loan specifically for company secretaries to meet business expansion, office setup, or professional development requirements, with tailored repayment options.
features: Tailored for CS professionals
Funds for office setup, compliance infrastructure, and professional development
Higher loan eligibility limits
Flexible repayment options

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Funds for office setup, compliance infrastructure, and professional development

sections.title: Onboarding Requirement
points: Identity Proof: Aadhaar, PAN, Passport or Voter ID
Address Proof: Aadhaar, Passport, Utility Bill
Professional Qualification: Degree Certificate, COP Certificate
Income Proof (Salaried): Last 3 months salary slips, 6 months bank statements
Income Proof (Self-Employed): Last 2 years ITR, Balance Sheet and P&L, 12 months bank statements
Business Proof (if running own practice or firm): Registration Certificate, GST Registration

categories.name: Business Loan
categories.description: Quick business financing without collateral

loans.title: Business Expansion Loan
loans.description: A loan designed for established businesses to finance growth initiatives such as opening new branches, increasing production capacity, marketing campaigns, or hiring additional staff.
features: Funds for business expansion, infrastructure, and working capital
Loan up to ₹50 Lakhs
Flexible repayment tenure
Quick processing for SMEs

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Funds for business expansion, infrastructure, and working capital

sections.title: Eligibility
points: SMEs or established businesses with minimum 3 years of operations
Annual turnover as per lender criteria (generally ₹40 Lakhs+)

sections.title: Onboarding Requirement
points: Identity Proof: Aadhaar, PAN of Proprietor, Partners, or Directors
Address Proof: Aadhaar, Utility Bill, Rent Agreement
Business Proof: Business Registration Certificate, Partnership Deed or Incorporation Certificate, GST Registration
Financial Proof: Last 2–3 years ITR, Balance Sheet and P&L Statement

loans.title: Startup Business Loan
loans.description: Tailored for new entrepreneurs and startups to support initial business setup, working capital, inventory purchase, and early-stage operations, typically requiring a strong business plan and projected cash flows.
features: For early-stage ventures and startup operations
Supports working capital, inventory purchase, and business setup
Often backed by CGTMSE (no collateral)
Quick processing and flexible repayment options

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: For early-stage ventures and startup operations
Supports working capital, inventory purchase, and business setup
Quick processing and flexible repayment options

sections.title: Eligibility
points: Registered startup or MSME with valid incorporation certificate
Business plan and projected cash flows required

sections.title: Onboarding Requirement
points: Identity Proof: Aadhaar, PAN of Proprietor, Partners, or Directors
Address Proof: Aadhaar, Utility Bill, Rent Agreement
Business Proof: Business Registration Certificate, Partnership Deed or Incorporation Certificate, GST Registration
Financial Proof: Last 2–3 years ITR, Balance Sheet and P&L Statement

loans.title: Merchant Cash Advance
loans.description: A short-term financing solution for merchants and retailers, where repayment is linked to future card sales or receivables—ideal for businesses needing quick working capital without collateral.
features: Advance against POS or online sales
Daily or weekly repayments based on sales
Quick processing for short-term working capital needs

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Advance against POS or online sales
Daily or weekly repayments based on sales
Quick processing for short-term working capital needs

sections.title: Eligibility
points: Merchants with minimum 6 months POS or digital sales history

sections.title: Onboarding Requirement
points: Identity Proof: Aadhaar, PAN of Proprietor, Partners, or Directors
Address Proof: Aadhaar, Utility Bill, Rent Agreement
Business Proof: Business Registration Certificate, Partnership Deed or Incorporation Certificate, GST Registration
Financial Proof: Last 2–3 years ITR, Balance Sheet and P&L Statement

loans.title: Franchise Financing Loan
loans.description: A loan to help entrepreneurs purchase, open, or expand franchise outlets, covering franchise fees, setup costs, inventory, and initial operational expenses.
features: Loan up to ₹50 Lakhs
For franchise purchase, setup, or expansion
Covers initial inventory and operational expenses
Flexible repayment tenure

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: For franchise purchase, setup, or expansion
Covers initial inventory and operational expenses

sections.title: Eligibility
points: Entrepreneurs or SMEs acquiring a franchise business
Business registration and valid agreement with franchisor required

sections.title: Onboarding Requirement
points: Identity Proof: Aadhaar, PAN of Proprietor, Partners, or Directors
Address Proof: Aadhaar, Utility Bill, Rent Agreement
Business Proof: Business Registration Certificate, Partnership Deed or Incorporation Certificate, GST Registration
Financial Proof: Last 2–3 years ITR, Balance Sheet and P&L Statement

loans.title: Equipment & Machinery Loan
loans.description: A secured loan for SMEs and corporates to purchase machinery, equipment, or vehicles necessary for business operations, with tenure and loan amount linked to asset value.
features: Advance for online sellers and e-commerce operations
Covers inventory, logistics, marketing, and technology upgrades
Based on digital sales turnover
Flexible repayment options

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Advance for online sellers and e-commerce operations
Covers inventory, logistics, marketing, and technology upgrades

sections.title: Eligibility
points: Registered sellers on platforms like Amazon, Flipkart, Shopify, etc.
Minimum 6 months of digital sales history
Consistent digital sales turnover as per lender norms

sections.title: Onboarding Requirement
points: Identity Proof: Aadhaar, PAN of Proprietor, Partners, or Directors
Address Proof: Aadhaar, Utility Bill, Rent Agreement
Business Proof: Business Registration Certificate, Partnership Deed or Incorporation Certificate, GST Registration
Financial Proof: Last 2–3 years ITR, Balance Sheet and P&L Statement

categories.name: Working Capital Loan
categories.description: Maintain smooth operations with short-term business funding.

loans.title: Invoice / Bill Discounting
loans.description: A facility where businesses receive immediate funds by discounting unpaid invoices, ideal for improving cash flow and managing short-term working capital needs without waiting for customer payments.
features: Funds against unpaid invoices
Reduces cash flow gap
Quick liquidity support
Short-term financing without collateral

sections.title: Eligibility
points: SMEs or MSMEs with valid corporate invoices
Annual turnover as per lender norms (₹20–30 Lakhs+ annually)

sections.title: Onboarding Requirement
points: Identity Proof: Aadhaar, PAN of Proprietor or Directors
Address Proof: Aadhaar, Utility Bill, Rent Agreement
Business Proof: Business Registration, GST Registration, Trade License (if applicable)
Financial Proof: Last 2–3 years ITR, Balance Sheet and P&L Statement, Projected Cash Flow

loans.title: Cash Credit (CC)
loans.description: A revolving credit facility linked to the current account, providing businesses with flexible short-term working capital, where interest is charged only on the utilized amount.
features: Revolving facility against stock or inventory
Interest charged only on utilized amount

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Revolving facility against stock or inventory
Interest charged only on utilized amount

sections.title: Eligibility
points: Minimum 3 years of business operations preferred
Collateral may be required (stock, receivables, property)

sections.title: Onboarding Requirement
points: Identity Proof: Aadhaar, PAN of Proprietor or Directors
Address Proof: Aadhaar, Utility Bill, Rent Agreement
Business Proof: Business Registration, GST Registration, Trade License (if applicable)
Financial Proof: Last 2–3 years ITR, Balance Sheet and P&L Statement, Projected Cash Flow

loans.title: Overdraft (OD) Facility
loans.description: A flexible credit line against the current account, allowing businesses to withdraw more than the account balance up to a pre-approved limit, with interest payable only on the drawn amount.
features: Revolving credit facility against stock or inventory
Interest charged only on utilized amount
Flexible withdrawal and repayment
Helps manage short-term working capital needs

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Revolving credit facility against stock or inventory
Interest charged only on utilized amount
Helps manage short-term working capital needs

sections.title: Eligibility
points: Minimum 3 years of business operations preferred
Collateral may be required (stock, receivables, property)

sections.title: Onboarding Requirement
points: Identity Proof: Aadhaar, PAN of Proprietor or Directors
Address Proof: Aadhaar, Utility Bill, Rent Agreement
Business Proof: Business Registration, GST Registration, Trade License (if applicable)
Financial Proof: Last 2–3 years ITR, Balance Sheet and P&L Statement, Projected Cash Flow

loans.title: Export Finance Loan
loans.description: A loan designed to support businesses engaged in exports, helping finance manufacturing, shipping, and other export-related costs until payment is received from overseas buyers.
features: Pre-shipment and post-shipment export funding
Covers manufacturing, logistics, and shipping costs
May include Export Credit Guarantee cover
Quick processing for export businesses

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Covers manufacturing, logistics, and shipping costs
May include Export Credit Guarantee cover

sections.title: Onboarding Requirement
points: Identity Proof: Aadhaar, PAN of Proprietor or Directors
Address Proof: Aadhaar, Utility Bill, Rent Agreement
Business Proof: Business Registration, GST Registration, Trade License (if applicable)
Financial Proof: Last 2–3 years ITR, Balance Sheet and P&L Statement, Projected Cash Flow

loans.title: Import Finance Loan
loans.description: A short-term credit facility to fund import-related payments, including purchase of raw materials, goods, or equipment from international suppliers.
features: Trade finance facility for importers
Working capital support for raw material and goods imports
Flexible repayment options
May require collateral or security

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Working capital support for raw material and goods imports

sections.title: Eligibility
points: Minimum 1 year of import business history
Collateral or security may be required

sections.title: Onboarding Requirement
points: Identity Proof: Aadhaar, PAN of Proprietor or Directors
Address Proof: Aadhaar, Utility Bill, Rent Agreement
Business Proof: Business Registration, GST Registration, Trade License (if applicable)
Financial Proof: Last 2–3 years ITR, Balance Sheet and P&L Statement, Projected Cash Flow

loans.title: Working Capital Term Loan
loans.description: A structured short-term loan for financing day-to-day business operations, offering fixed repayment schedules and typically based on turnover, cash flow, and business requirements.
features: Fixed-tenure working capital funding
Provides immediate liquidity for daily business operations
Supports expansion of operational cash flow
Quick processing for SMEs or MSMEs

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Provides immediate liquidity for daily business operations
Supports expansion of operational cash flow
Quick processing for SMEs or MSMEs

sections.title: Eligibility
points: SMEs or MSMEs with regular turnover records
Good bureau or CIBIL score (650+ preferred)

sections.title: Onboarding Requirement
points: Identity Proof: Aadhaar, PAN of Proprietor or Directors
Address Proof: Aadhaar, Utility Bill, Rent Agreement
Business Proof: Business Registration, GST Registration, Trade License (if applicable)
Financial Proof: Last 2–3 years ITR, Balance Sheet and P&L Statement, Projected Cash Flow

categories.name: Loan Against Securities
categories.description: Loans backed by collateral such as gold, FDs, insurance policies, or property, offering lower interest rates and higher approval chances.

loans.title: Loan Against Shares
loans.description: A loan granted by pledging equity shares as collateral, allowing access to liquidity without selling holdings; interest is charged on the utilized amount, and the loan amount depends on the value of pledged shares.
features: Loan against listed shares
Retain ownership of shares while raising funds
Quick processing and flexible repayment
Loan amount based on market value of pledged shares

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Retain ownership of shares while raising funds
Loan amount based on market value of pledged shares

sections.title: Eligibility
points: Investors holding listed equity shares in demat form
Minimum market value of shares as per lender norms (₹50,000–₹1 Lakh+)

sections.title: Onboarding Requirement
points: Address Proof: Aadhaar, Passport, Utility Bill
Securities Proof: Demat Account Statement, Share Certificates, Mutual Fund Statements, Bonds, Insurance Policies
Income Proof: Last 3 months salary slips (salaried) or ITR (self-employed)

loans.title: Loan Against Mutual Funds
loans.description: A loan provided against mutual fund units as collateral, ideal for investors seeking short-term liquidity without redeeming investments, with loan amount determined by the market value of pledged units.
features: Loan against debt or equity mutual funds
Overdraft facility available
Retain investment while accessing liquidity
Quick processing based on market value of units

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Loan against debt or equity mutual funds
Quick processing based on market value of units

sections.title: Eligibility
points: Mutual fund investors with units in demat or statement form
Both debt and equity schemes accepted (except ELSS)

sections.title: Onboarding Requirement
points: Address Proof: Aadhaar, Passport, Utility Bill
Securities Proof: Demat Account Statement, Share Certificates, Mutual Fund Statements, Bonds, Insurance Policies
Income Proof: Last 3 months salary slips (salaried) or ITR (self-employed)

loans.title: Loan Against Bonds/Debentures
loans.description: A loan secured against bonds or debentures held by an individual or business, enabling access to funds while retaining ownership and benefits of the underlying securities.
features: Loan against corporate bonds and debentures
Liquidity without selling securities
Flexible repayment options based on loan amount
Quick access to funds against approved securities

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Loan against corporate bonds and debentures
Flexible repayment options based on loan amount
Quick access to funds against approved securities

sections.title: Eligibility
points: Bond or debenture holders with listed or approved securities
Security should be approved by lender

sections.title: Onboarding Requirement
points: Address Proof: Aadhaar, Passport, Utility Bill
Securities Proof: Demat Account Statement, Share Certificates, Mutual Fund Statements, Bonds, Insurance Policies
Income Proof: Last 3 months salary slips (salaried) or ITR (self-employed)

loans.title: Loan Against Bonds/Debentures
loans.description: A loan secured against bonds or debentures held by an individual or business, enabling access to funds while retaining ownership and benefits of the underlying securities.
features: Loan against corporate bonds and debentures
Liquidity without selling securities
Flexible repayment options based on loan amount
Quick access to funds against approved securities

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Loan against corporate bonds and debentures
Flexible repayment options based on loan amount
Quick access to funds against approved securities

sections.title: Eligibility
points: Bond or debenture holders with listed or approved securities
Security should be approved by lender

sections.title: Onboarding Requirement
points: Address Proof: Aadhaar, Passport, Utility Bill
Securities Proof: Demat Account Statement, Share Certificates, Mutual Fund Statements, Bonds, Insurance Policies
Income Proof: Last 3 months salary slips (salaried) or ITR (self-employed)

loans.title: Loan Against Insurance Policies
loans.description: A loan availed by pledging the cash value of an insurance policy, such as a whole life or endowment policy, suitable for short-term liquidity needs while keeping the policy active.
features: Loan against surrender value of insurance policy
No need to surrender policy

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Loan against surrender value of insurance policy

sections.title: Eligibility
points: Life insurance policyholders with traditional or endowment policies (ULIPs usually excluded)

sections.title: Onboarding Requirement
points: Address Proof: Aadhaar, Passport, Utility Bill
Securities Proof: Demat Account Statement, Share Certificates, Mutual Fund Statements, Bonds, Insurance Policies
Income Proof: Last 3 months salary slips (salaried) or ITR (self-employed)

loans.title: Loan Against Debt Securities
loans.description: A loan secured by government or corporate fixed-income instruments like bonds, NCDs, or other debt securities, offering liquidity without selling the underlying asset.
features: Loan against listed government and corporate debt securities (e.g., bonds, NCDs)
Quick processing and flexible tenure
Retain coupon accrual and ownership while accessing funds
No need to liquidate securities

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Loan against listed bonds, NCDs, and approved debt instruments

sections.title: Eligibility
points: Holders of listed or lender-approved debt securities in demat form
Securities must meet lender's eligibility list and haircut norms
Good repayment or bureau history preferred

sections.title: Onboarding Requirement
points: Address Proof: Aadhaar, Passport, Utility Bill
Securities Proof: Demat Account Statement detailing eligible debt securities
Income Proof: Last 3 months salary slips (salaried) or latest ITR (self-employed)

categories.name: Loan Against Property
categories.description: Grow your business with collateral-backed financing

categories.name: Home Loan
categories.description: Realize your dream of owning a home

loans.title: Home Construction Loan
loans.description: For constructing a new house on a plot of land you already own. Disbursed in stages based on progress.
features: For construction on self-owned land
Loan disbursed in tranches linked to progress
Tenure up to 30 years
Lower rates than personal loans

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Loan disbursed in tranches linked to progress

sections.title: Eligibility
points: Clear land title and plan approval required

sections.title: Onboarding Requirement
points: Property Docs: Title Deed, Approved Plan

loans.title: Home Loan Balance Transfer
loans.description: Transfer your existing home loan to another lender offering better rates, lower EMIs, or top-up options.
features: Switch to lower interest rate
Option to combine with a top-up loan
Reduce EMI burden and tenure
Tenure reset as per new lender’s terms

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Option to combine with a top-up loan
Tenure reset as per new lender’s terms

sections.title: Eligibility
points: Existing home loan with 12+ EMIs paid

sections.title: Onboarding Requirement
points: Property Docs: Sale Deed, Sanction Letter

loans.title: Home Purchase Loan
loans.description: Ideal for buying a ready-to-move or under-construction residential property from a builder or developer.
features: Funding up to 75%–90% of property cost
Tenure up to 30 years
Attractive interest rates starting from ~8.5%
Applicable for Indian residents and NRIs

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: For purchase of flat, villa, or builder floor
Funding up to 75%–90% of property cost

sections.title: Eligibility
points: Stable income source & good credit score

sections.title: Onboarding Requirement
points: Property Documents: Sale Agreement, Allotment Letter

loans.title: Home Renovation Loan
loans.description: Finance home improvement needs like repairs, remodeling, painting, flooring, or interiors.
features: Loan amount up to ₹25–30 lakhs
Can be secured or unsecured
Tenure up to 15 years
Lower interest than personal loan (if secured)

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Loan amount up to ₹25–30 lakhs (based on value)
Can be secured or unsecured depending on amount
Lower interest than personal loan (if secured)

loans.title: Plot + Construction Loan
loans.description: Finance both land purchase and subsequent house construction within a stipulated time (typically 1–2 years).
features: Covers plot purchase and home construction
Tenure up to 30 years
Stage-wise disbursement during construction
Construction must start within specified period

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Covers plot purchase and home construction
Construction must start within specified period

sections.title: Eligibility
points: Indian residents with valid income proof

loans.title: Top-Up Home Loan
loans.description: Get extra funds over your existing home loan without the need for a fresh loan process.
features: Lower rate than personal loans
Use for personal, medical, education, or renovation
Fast processing and minimal documentation

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Additional loan amount on existing home loan
Use for personal, medical, education, or renovation

sections.title: Eligibility
points: Existing home loan borrower with regular repayment
Minimum 6–12 EMIs paid on existing loan

categories.name: Vehicle Loan
categories.description: Drive your dreams with easy vehicle financing

loans.title: Commercial Vehicle Loan
loans.description: Designed for individuals or fleet owners purchasing commercial vehicles such as trucks, tempos, buses, or auto-rickshaws.
features: Funding up to 85%–100% of vehicle value
For new and used commercial vehicles
Tenure up to 5–7 years
Option for seasonal EMIs (flexible repayment)

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Funding up to 85%–100% of vehicle value
For new and used commercial vehicles

sections.title: Eligibility
points: Should have valid commercial driving license (if owner-driver)

loans.title: Electric Vehicle Loan
loans.description: Get subsidized loans for purchasing electric 2-wheelers, 3-wheelers, or 4-wheelers, supported by government and private schemes.
features: Special EV interest rates starting ~7.5% p.a.
Eligible for government subsidy under FAME scheme
Tenure up to 7 years
Covers bikes, scooters, e-autos, e-cars

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Special EV interest rates starting ~7.5% p.a.
Eligible for government subsidy under FAME scheme

sections.title: Eligibility

loans.title: New Car Loan
loans.description: Finance the purchase of a brand-new car — hatchback, sedan, SUV, or MUV — with attractive interest rates and flexible EMIs.
features: Funding up to 90%–100% of ex-showroom price
Tenure from 1 to 7 years
Competitive interest rates (~8.5% onwards)
Fast approval with minimal documentation

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Funding up to 90%–100% of ex-showroom price

loans.title: Two-Wheeler Loan
loans.description: Finance the purchase of a scooter, bike, or superbike with easy EMIs and low down payment.
features: Up to 90%–100% funding of on-road price
Loan tenure from 6 months to 5 years
Affordable EMI plans starting ₹500/month
Quick approval; some lenders offer zero interest

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Up to 90%–100% funding of on-road price
Loan tenure from 6 months to 5 years
Quick approval; some lenders offer zero interest

sections.title: Onboarding Requirement

loans.title: Used Car Loan
loans.description: Buy a pre-owned or second-hand car with flexible funding options and tenure based on vehicle age.

Tenure up to 5 years
Interest rate slightly higher than new car loans
For cars up to 8–10 years old

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Loan up to 70%–90% of car’s valuation

insurance.title: Insurance
insurance.description: So many insurances, only one that fits you — we help you find it.

categories.name: Health Insurance
categories.description: Comprehensive medical coverage for individuals and families with flexible options and tax benefits.

loans.title: Family Floater Plans
loans.description: Single policy covering the entire family (self, spouse, children, parents) with a shared sum insured.

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: One premium covers all family members
Shared coverage amount for all members

loans.title: Individual Health Plans
loans.description: Covers a single individual for hospitalization, surgeries, and other medical expenses with annual health cover limits.

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Add-ons: Maternity, critical illness, room rent waiver

loans.title: Senior Citizen Health Plans
loans.description: Tailored for individuals aged 60 and above with extended medical and hospitalization coverage.

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Coverage for age-related illnesses & pre-existing conditions
Includes annual health check-up & higher sum insured
Higher waiting periods, but wider cover scope

categories.name: Life Insurance
categories.description: Comprehensive plans that protect your family’s future while helping you save and invest.

loans.title: Child Insurance Plans
loans.description: Designed to secure a child’s future with funds for education, marriage, or other milestones, even in case of parent's demise.

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Policy continues even after parent's death
Lump sum payout at key milestones or maturity
Option for waiver of premium benefit

sections.title: Eligibility
points: Parent (18–55 years) insures life for benefit of child
Child’s age usually from 0 to 17 years

loans.title: Retirement & Pension Plans
loans.description: Builds a retirement corpus with regular income (annuity) post-retirement. Can be purchased as deferred or immediate annuity.

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Option for lifetime annuity or joint annuity

loans.title: Whole Life Insurance
loans.description: Provides lifelong coverage (up to age 99 or 100) along with a savings/investment component and guaranteed death benefit.

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Premium payment terms: limited or whole life

categories.name: Investment Plans
categories.description: Build wealth and secure your future with guaranteed returns or market-linked insurance solutions.

loans.title: Guaranteed Return Plans
loans.description: Offer assured maturity amount irrespective of market conditions — ideal for conservative investors.

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Premium options: Single, limited, or regular pay
Tax-saving under Sec 80C & tax-free returns under 10(10D)

loans.title: Savings Endowment Plans
loans.description: Traditional life insurance plan that provides a lump sum on maturity along with life cover.

loans.title: Unit Linked Insurance Plans (ULIPs)
loans.description: Combines life insurance with market-linked investments, offering flexibility and long-term wealth creation.

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Choose from equity, debt, or balanced funds

categories.name: Motor Insurance

points: Covers own damage, third-party liability, theft

sections.title: Eligibility
points: Owner of private car (individual or company)
Vehicle must be registered in India
Drivers must hold valid driving license

loans.title: Commercial Vehicle Insurance

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Includes own damage, third-party liability, fire, theft
Custom add-ons: Legal liability to paid driver, accessories

sections.title: Eligibility
points: Vehicle must be registered as commercial

loans.title: Two-Wheeler Insurance

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Covers damages to own bike and third party
Mandatory as per Motor Vehicles Act
Add-ons: Personal Accident, Pillion Rider Cover

categories.name: Travel Insurance
categories.description: Stay protected during your travels — domestic or international — with coverage for medical emergencies, cancellations, and lost baggage.

loans.title: Domestic Travel Insurance

points: Medical, personal accident, and baggage cover

Covers delays, missed connections, hotel issues

sections.title: Eligibility

sections.title: Key Highlights

sections.title: Eligibility
points: Age: 6 months to 70+ years (varies by plan)

loans.title: Student Travel Insurance

sections.title: Key Highlights
points: Medical, study interruption, sponsor protection cover
